com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheapstruct

Class OffHeapStructSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheapstruct.OffHeapStructSorter

  • public class OffHeapStructSorter
extends Object

    alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapStructCollection.

    This class implements the Dual-Pivot Quicksort algorithm by Vladimir Yaroslavskiy, Jon Bentley, and Joshua Bloch. The algorithm offers O(n log(n)) performance on many data sets that cause other quicksorts to degrade to quadratic performance, and is typically faster than traditional (one-pivot) Quicksort implementations.

    Version:
    2009.11.29 m765.827.12i
    Author:
    Vladimir Yaroslavskiy, Jon Bentley, Josh Bloch

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static int INSERTION_SORT_THRESHOLD
      If the length of an collection to be sorted is less than this constant, insertion sort is used in preference to Quicksort.

      • sortedIterator

        public static OffHeapDisposableIterator<byte[]> sortedIterator(ExecutorService executor,
                                               int threadsCount,
                                               OffHeapStructCollection collection,
                                               Comparator<OffHeapStructAccessor> comparator)
        Partially sorts collection and returns fully sorted iterator over it
        Parameters:
        executor - executor service for parallel sorting
        threadsCount - number of worker threads to use
        collection - the off-heap struct collection to be sorted
        comparator - structs comparator
        Returns:
        sorted iterator over the collection
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if (fromIndex < 0 || fromIndex > toIndex || toIndex > a.size())
        RuntimeException - on worker thread error

                                               long fromIndex,
                                               long toIndex)
        Partially sorts part of the collection and returns fully sorted iterator over it
        Parameters:
        executor - executor service for parallel sorting
        threadsCount - number of worker threads to use
        collection - the off-heap struct collection to be sorted
        fromIndex - the index of the first element, inclusive, to be sorted
        toIndex - the index of the last element, exclusive, to be sorted
        comparator - structs comparator
        Returns:
        sorted iterator over the collection part
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if (fromIndex < 0 || fromIndex > toIndex || toIndex > a.size())
        RuntimeException - on worker thread error

      • sortByLongKey

        public static void sortByLongKey(OffHeapStructCollection a,
                 int keyOffset)
        Sorts the specified off-heap struct collection into ascending order using long struct key.
        Parameters:
        a - the off-heap struct collection to be sorted
        keyOffset - long key field offset within stuct bounds

      • sortByLongKey

        public static void sortByLongKey(OffHeapStructCollection a,
                 long fromIndex,
                 long toIndex,
                 int keyOffset)
        Sorts the specified range of the off-heap struct collection into ascending order using long struct key. The range to be sorted extends from the index fromIndex, inclusive, to the index toIndex, exclusive. If fromIndex == toIndex, the range to be sorted is empty (and the call is a no-op).
        Parameters:
        a - the off-heap struct collection to be sorted
        fromIndex - the index of the first element, inclusive, to be sorted
        toIndex - the index of the last element, exclusive, to be sorted
        keyOffset - long sort key field offset within stuct bounds
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if (fromIndex < 0 || fromIndex > toIndex || toIndex > a.size())

      • sortByLongKeysParallel

        public static void sortByLongKeysParallel(Executor executor,
                          int threads,
                          OffHeapStructCollection a,
                          int key1Offset,
                          int key2Offset)
        Sorts collection by two long keys. Second key sorting is done in parallel.
        Parameters:
        executor - executor for parallel sorting
        threads - number of worker threads to use
        a - the off-heap struct collection to be sorted
        key1Offset - first key offset
        key2Offset - second key offset

      • sortByUnsignedLongKey

        public static void sortByUnsignedLongKey(OffHeapStructCollection a,
                         int keyOffset)
        Sorts the specified off-heap struct collection into ascending order using unsigned long struct key.
        Parameters:
        a - the off-heap struct collection to be sorted
        keyOffset - long key field offset within stuct bounds

      • sortByUnsignedLongKey

        public static void sortByUnsignedLongKey(OffHeapStructCollection a,
                         long fromIndex,
                         long toIndex,
                         int keyOffset)
        Sorts the specified range of the off-heap struct collection into ascending order using unsigned long struct key. The range to be sorted extends from the index fromIndex, inclusive, to the index toIndex, exclusive. If fromIndex == toIndex, the range to be sorted is empty (and the call is a no-op).
        Parameters:
        a - the off-heap struct collection to be sorted
        fromIndex - the index of the first element, inclusive, to be sorted
        toIndex - the index of the last element, exclusive, to be sorted
        keyOffset - long sort key field offset within stuct bounds
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if (fromIndex < 0 || fromIndex > toIndex || toIndex > a.size())
